thread.title: Gamecocks player after loss: 'Should (have) looked around like...
thread.title_full: Gamecocks player after loss: 'Should (have) looked around like... | www.kirotv.com

author: Alec Shirkey
title: Gamecocks player after loss: 'Should (have) looked around like...
text:
SEC Country
One of South Carolina’s top signees from this past year’s recruiting class questioned his decision to sign with the Gamecocks following their 45-24 loss to LSU on Saturday night.
>> RELATED: Caught on video: Tennessee football player stomps on UGA linebacker's helmet
Defensive end Shameik Blackshear, a former four-star recruit out of Bluffton, South Carolina, took to Twitter to voice his apparent regret at choosing South Carolina over other schools.
>> Read more trending stories
“Should (have) looked around like my parents said,” Blackshear tweeted . He added in a following tweet that everyone should listen to his or her parents.
Should of looked around like my parents said.
— Shameik Blackshear (@Gwopo_7) October 11, 2015 Listen to yall parents, they know best💯
— Shameik Blackshear (@Gwopo_7) October 11, 2015 Earlier Saturday, co-defensive coordinator Lorenzo Ward told reporters that Blackshear would likely be redshirted this season.
Shameik Blackshear now likely to redshirt, Lorenzo Ward says.
— GoGamecocks.com (@gogamecocks) October 10, 2015 Posted by Shameik Blackshear on Tuesday, September 8, 2015
